name: Burmese Blade: Journey of the Warrior
name_original: Burmese Blade: Journey of the Warrior
description:
Title: Burmese Blade: Journey of the Warrior

Gameplay Overview: Burmese Blade is an engaging 2D game that takes players back to the second Mongol invasion of Burma in AD1300. As a Burmese conscript, player must use their melee skills to protect their homeland against the Mongol army.

Gameplay Mechanics: The game features a side-scrolling perspective, with players controlling a Burmese soldier to defend against waves of Mongol invaders. Players must dodge incoming attacks, including swords and spears. The game includes healing sites to help players in battle.

As players progress through the game, they will face tougher enemies, including elite Mongol soldiers.  The game will win when you killed 20 enemies. See you in next updates. Thank you.
